messages.content: The flower that smells the best is the rose. Its sweet fragrance and wide range of colors make it a popular and beloved flower.
Could you please explain general relativity in 25 words or fewer?
General relativity is a theory of gravitation that states that the laws of physics are the same for all observers, regardless of their motion or gravitational field.
Tell me a short story in the style of Douglas Adams, about a dog and a cat in a bathtub.

Once upon a time there was a dog and a cat who found themselves in a bathtub together. The dog was delighted, as he had always wanted to try out the famous human contraption. The cat was not so sure - but since the dog was so excited, she decided to go along for the ride. So, the two of them hopped in the tub, and the dog started to play with the water, while the cat watched curiously from the side. After a few moments, they both realized that this was much more fun than they had expected, and they continued to have a great time - much to the surprise of both the dog and cat!
